user_auth.views module

user_auth.views.authenticate_user(request)[source]

Authenticates user credentials and logs in the user.

Processes the login form data, verifies the credentials against the database, and logs in the user if authentication is successful. Displays error message if authentication fails.

Parameters:

request (HttpRequest) – HttpRequest object containing the form data in POST

Returns:

HttpResponse with login form (on error) or redirect to dashboard

(on success) :rtype: HttpResponse

user_auth.views.create_user(request)[source]

Processes user registration form submission and creates a new user.

Validates form data, checks if username exists, confirms password match, and creates a new user account. Returns appropriate error messages if validation fails.

Parameters:

request (HttpRequest) – HttpRequest object containing the form data in POST

Returns:

HttpResponse with registration form (on error) or redirect to

login (on success) :rtype: HttpResponse

user_auth.views.user_login(request)[source]

Displays the login page to the user.

This view renders the login form where users can enter their credentials.

Parameters:

request (HttpRequest) – HttpRequest object containing metadata about the request

Returns:

HttpResponse object with the rendered login template

Return type:

HttpResponse

Displays the login page to the user.

This view renders the login form where users can enter their credentials.

Parameters:

Returns:
